fields.title: Harris 1991 Omnibus Public Opinion Survey, study no. 911104

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This study focuses on current issues including the Gulf War, Saddam Hussein, economy, recession, rating of Bush, parental leave, crime, federal payroll tax, confidence in commercial banks, AIDS, and most important problem facing the country today.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Cross-national random-digit-dialing telephone sample of U.S. adults; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-911104;

distributor.distributorName: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science
